Module nielson.c195projectmkn
Package nielson.c195projectmkn.helper

Class ClientQuery

java.lang.Object
nielson.c195projectmkn.helper.ClientQuery
public abstract class ClientQuery extends Object
Author:
mckaykn The ClientQuery Class represents the primary helper class for my controllers to use. It includes all JDBC type methods.

    • getAllAppointmentsByWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsByWeek() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all appointments scheduled for the current week, defined as the time between the previous Sunday and the upcoming Saturday.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of Appointment objects that fall within the current week
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • getAllAppointmentsByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointmentsByMonth() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all appointments scheduled for the current month, defined as the time between the first day of month and the last day of month.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of Appointment objects that fall within the current month
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • getAppointmentsWithin15Minutes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsWithin15Minutes() throws SQLException
      Returns a list of appointments scheduled to start within the next 15 minutes from the current time.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Appointment objects representing appointments scheduled to start within the next 15 minutes.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query.
